0: Beware the Sleep Number feature might not be working and you could end up sleeping on a rock
The worst thing I will say is that even though my phone and IPad said wifi was connected we never got service in the entire hotel
I was a little disappointed this time
Sleep number beds were capped so we could not adjust them
The staff was so helpfulcanot think of anything
Carpet has a old stench to it
Could have gotten rid of wallpaper
One of the 2 elevators was down so the wait was long at times

1: amazing and very nice hotel to stay
Would like to recognize Bambi for her over the top excellent customer service
What a great place staff everyone from top to bottom were so great We will be back again
The hotel was very clean and the staff was excellent
We also enjoyed the attached restaurant
Front desk staff were always super friendly and very inviting even when my 6 year old pestered them for cookies every time we came and went
I checked into my room and diged up my email confirmation for the hotel
Will definitely try to stay there again
